mapper.sql: select article_id, title, summary, content, author, view_count, thumb_count, collect_count, cover, status, is_publish, sort, open_comment, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from t_article
mapper.select: select a.* from t_article a, t_article_sort s where a.article_id = s.article_id and s.sort_id = #{sortId} and a.del_flag = '0' and a.status = 2 /* 查询已发布的文章 */
select a.* from t_article a, t_article_tag t where a.article_id = t.article_id and t.tag_id = #{tagId} and a.del_flag = '0' and a.status = 2 /* 查询已发布的文章 */
